name: Walker (itch)
description:
Join Raven on her journey north, and help her overcome perilous monsters and obstacles.

Made for the Ludum Dare 35 72 Hour Jam.

Controls
- LEFT/RIGHT or A/D: turn around

- UP or W: move forwards

- DOWN or S: move backwards

- 1: Change into human (from other forms)

- 2: Change into raven (from other forms/requires raven mask)

- 3: Change into wolf (from other forms/requires wolf mask)

- SPACEBAR [Hold Down to fly/sneak]:

  • Jump (as human)
  • Fly (as Raven, depletes magic energy)
  • Sneak (as Wolf, deplete magic energy, sneak stops you from making noise when walking through tall grass and alerting monsters)
